titles.title: Create In Me A Clean Heart

properties.copyright: 1982 Bases Loaded Music, Administered by BMG Music Publishing

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
E
Create in me a clean heart
O God
And renew a right spirit within me
Create in me a clean heart
O God
And renew a right spirit within me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Cast me not away from Thy presence O Lord
Take not Thy Holy Spirit from me
Restore unto me the joy of Thy salvation
And renew a right spirit within me
